channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- User Registration – Custom Registration Form, Login And User Profile For WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- User Registration – Custom Registration Form, Login And User Profile For WordPress

item.title: CVE-2021-24654|2024-08-03T19:35:20.367Z -- unknown -- user%20registration%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20registration%20form%2C%20login%20and%20user%20profile%20for%20wordpress
item.description: The User Registration WordPress plugin before 2.0.2 does not properly sanitise the user_registration_profile_pic_url value when submitted directly via the user_registration_update_profile_details AJAX action. This could allow any authenticated user, such as subscriber, to perform Stored Cross-Site attacks when their profile is viewed
